question: The theme for Commonwealth Day 2018 is ___________.
explanation: From Samoa to Canada, 53 countries unite under one flag today to commemorate Commonwealth Day under the 2018 theme of 'Towards a Common Future'. The Commonwealth Day 2018 was observed in India on 24th May. It was earlier known as Empire Day. It is an annual celebration of the Commonwealth of Nations. It is celebrated on the second Monday in March in many countries. In India it is celebrated on 24th May.
